title: Various Artists - Blue Note the Collector's Edition [2010]
description:
Various Artists - Blue Note the Collector's Edition [2010/CD/FLAC/Lossless]

To commemorate the 70th anniversary of Blue Note will be released only in Korea
Limited Edition Box Set 25CD Box Set / LP Sleeve as production

Famous Blue Note Jazz footsteps in one place for 70 years as President Meets alum!
Blue Note was not ever able to meet a set of boxes to meet the unprecedented price!

Blue Note celebrates the 70th anniversary of its foundation in South Korea the world's first to be released only limited release box set!
Lee of Adelaide Cannonball [Somethin 'Else], as well as Lou Donaldson's [Blues Walk] representative to the Blue Note
Popular alum 24 titles at the lowest price all at once, only once, the chances of selection can be!
